shortDescription: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in TemplateInvaders TI WooCommerce Wishlist allows SQL Injection.This issue affects TI WooCommerce Wishlist: from n/a through 2.8.2.
vulnerabilityName: templateinvaders ti_woocommerce_wishlist Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
